name: Swap Way to Racing
description:
Challenge your reaction time?
How many laps you can play before you burst into small metal chunks and flames?

Simple but funny enough casual racing games.

Introduce:
You control a car, tap screen to change lanes. Do not let other's car collide your car.
- EASY!!! EXCITING!!!

Features with this game:
- one tap gameplay
- Scores and leaderboard
